meanings.definition: The state or quality of being dirty or unclean.
meanings.sent1: The filthinesses of the alley were evident from the overflowing trash cans.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't stand the filthinesses of the public restroom.
meanings.sent3: The filthinesses of the muddy puddles made the children giggle as they jumped over them.
meanings.sent4: The filthinesses of his lies tarnished his reputation beyond repair.
meanings.sent5: The filthinesses of the abandoned house were hauntingly vivid in her memory.

meanings.definition: Actions or behaviors that are morally or spiritually impure.
meanings.sent1: The filthinesses of his deceitful actions were exposed for all to see.
meanings.sent2: She was determined to cleanse her soul from the filthinesses of her past mistakes.
meanings.sent3: The filthinesses of gossip spread like wildfire in the small town.
meanings.sent4: The filthinesses of corruption seeped into every corner of the government.
meanings.sent5: The filthinesses of envy consumed her thoughts, poisoning her mind.
